<< removecompilerconf dynamic link dllib_used >>

dlclose

Removes dllib object.

Syntax

dllib_delete(h)
delete(h)
dlclose(h)

Input argument

h

a handle: an dllib object.

Description

dlclose(h) or delete(h) releases dllib object.

Do not forget to clear h afterward.

Example

path_ref = [modulepath(nelsonroot(),'dynamic_link','bin'), '/libnlsDynamic_link', getdynlibext()];
lib = dlopen(path_ref)
isvalid(lib)
dlclose(lib); // or delete(lib)
isvalid(lib)

See also

dlopen.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET

<< removecompilerconf dynamic link dllib_used >>
